HERO.TITLE: Your future - with a partner as strong as our love for animals
HERO.DESCRIPTION: We want to offer pets the best possible medical care through VetTrust. Become a part of it and be a part of the largest Swiss network of practices.

INTEREST.TITLE: Have we aroused your interest?
INTEREST.DESCRIPTION: For further information, please do not hesitate to contact our specialist for our various integration models Daniel Knobloch. Your inquiries will be treated with the utmost discretion.

BULLET_CARDS_GRID.TITLE: "Relaxed about the future" or "never on your own again": the choice is yours!

BULLETS.SUBTITLE_1: The modern way to be a vet.
BULLETS.SUBTITLE_2: The new system of flexible (partial) integration.
BULLETS.SUBTITLE_3: Knowing your practice is in good hands.
BULLETS.DESCRIPTION_1:
The modern way to be a veterinarian.
Relieving you of what keeps you from doing your real work and enabling true teamwork. Be a veterinarian again.
BULLETS.DESCRIPTION_2:
The new system of flexible (partial) integration.
Decide when, what and how much you want to give away. It is your future.
BULLETS.DESCRIPTION_3:
Knowing your practice is in good hands.
We are happy to offer you location-individual solutions, security for the future of your patients, customers and of course employees.

ADVANTAGES_CARDS_GRID.TITLE: VetTrust - Your advantages
ADVANTAGES_CARDS_GRID.CARD_1: You determine the time of delivery
ADVANTAGES_CARDS_GRID.CARD_2: Quick preparation of a fair offer
ADVANTAGES_CARDS_GRID.CARD_5: Latest technical infrastructure, digital tools (online booking & video consultation) and interesting offers for your customers
ADVANTAGES_CARDS_GRID.CARD_6: Regional structure including common emergency ring
ADVANTAGES_CARDS_GRID.CARD_9: Broad expertise: exchange with our specialists brings quick answers
ADVANTAGES_CARDS_GRID.CARD_10: Work life balance: what self-employed person doesn't dream of paid vacations and more free time?
